content.en: Algorithmic optimization: Researchers have explored the use of various algorithms, such as simulation-based genetic algorithms, optimization via simulation, and genetic algorithms, to improve the performance of manufacturing systems. These algorithms are used to address questions like how to integrate process planning and scheduling, how to solve the manufacturing cell formation problem, and how to design scheduling rules for complex systems. By leveraging the power of algorithms, scientists aim to optimize production processes, minimize costs, and improve efficiency in industries like textiles and reconfigurable manufacturing systems.
content.da: Algoritmisk optimering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forskellige algoritmer, såsom simulationsbaserede genetiske algoritmer, optimering via simulation og genetiske algoritmer, for at forbedre ydeevnen i produktionssystemer. Disse algoritmer bruges til at besvare spørgsmål som hvordan man integrerer procesplanlægning og planlægning, hvordan man løser problemet med dannelse af produktionsceller, og hvordan man designer planlægningsregler for komplekse systemer. Ved at udnytte algoritmernes kraft, sigter forskere mod at optimere produktionsprocesser, minimere omkostninger og forbedre effektiviteten i industrier som tekstil og konfigurerbare produktionssystemer.
